articles.description: "No pain, no gain" is a commonly used expression when it comes to getting in shape. It may also be why many of us think that you need to feel sore after a workout to know that you've done enough.
articles.content:

articles.title: SAGE-718 Demonstrates Safety, Signs of Improvement in Phase 2 Alzheimer Disease Study - Neurology Live
articles.description: Sage Therapeutics’ investigational NMDA receptor positive allosteric modulator was well-tolerated, with signs of cognitive and functional improvements reported for patients with AD in the phase 2 LUMINARY study.
